database

Class GameOnDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.GameOnDAO

  • public class GameOnDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class offers common database functionalities. It should be used in place of making your own calls against the database in the controller classes.
    Version:
    1.0 9/19/2014
    Author:
    Andrew Zurn

      • isGameOwned

        public static boolean isGameOwned(java.lang.String name)
        Return the OWNED status of a game if it exists, otherwise return false.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the game whose OWNED property is to be found
        Returns:
        true if the game is owned, false if it is not owned or if it doesn't exist

        Add a vote to the given game with id matching the GAME_ID
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the vote that was saved in the database

      • addGame

        public static Game addGame(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String detailsUrl,
                           java.lang.String imageUrl,
                           java.lang.Long categoryId,
                           boolean owned)
        Add a game to the database if the game does not already exist by the given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new game
        detailsUrl - the detailsUrl of the new game
        imageUrl - the imageUrl of the new game
        categoryId - the categoryId of the new game
        owned - the owned status of the new game
        Returns:
        the game if it is saved, otherwise null

      • addGame

        public static Game addGame(Game game)
        Add a game to the database if the game does not already exist by the given name
        Parameters:
        game - the game object of the new game
        Returns:
        the game if it is saved, otherwise null
